long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summon a window that will format text to suit your needs.
The formats include: 
Row/Col transform - self explanatory, removes spaces and makes each word/number in a new row, does the opposite on next click.
Comma - Adds or removes commas between each word/number.
Quotes - places each word into quotes or does the opposite on next click.
Copy - Copies text to clipboard.

If you want to add some kind of formatting - please leave a comment!
